[i]Ardenvale [/i][i]Adamant[/i] – If {W}{W}{W} was spent to cast this spell, this turn, each creature you control enters with an additional +1/+1 counter and a flying counter on it.
Create a 2/2 blue Shapeshifter creature token with changeling. [i](This card is every creature type.)[/i]
